question: Do all toes have to touch the floor when in sajdah?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Only those toes will have to touch the ground that can reach the ground
comfortably in the Sajdah position. It is not practically possible for all
the toes to reach the ground.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
